components.name: AboutSectionComponent

propertiesClass.name: buttonData
propertiesClass.defaultValue:
{
    title: 'Download Resume',
    type: 'primary',
    width: '200',
    widthUnits: 'px',
    height: '50',
    heightUnits: 'px',
  }

propertiesClass.name: paragraphText
propertiesClass.defaultValue:
[
    `I am a passionate software developer with a love for creating innovative solutions. I enjoy working with the latest technologies and continuously learning to improve my skills. In my free time, I like to explore new programming languages and frameworks, as well as contribute to open-source projects.`,
    `I am a passionate software developer with a love for creating innovative solutions. I enjoy working with the latest technologies and continuously learning to improve my skills. In my free time, I like to explore new programming languages and frameworks, as well as contribute to open-source projects.`,
    `I am a passionate software developer with a love for creating innovative solutions. I enjoy working with the latest technologies and continuously learning to improve my skills. In my free time, I like to explore new programming languages and frameworks, as well as contribute to open-source projects.`,
  ]

components.name: AppComponent
ButtonComponent
components.templateData:
<button
  type="button"
  (click)="buttonClicked($event)"
  class="storybook-button storybook-button--{{ type() }}"
  [ngStyle]="{
    width: computedWidth(),
    height: computedHeight()
  }"
  title="{{ title() }}"
>
  {{ title() }}
</button>

components.name: ContactSectionComponent

propertiesClass.name: buttonData
propertiesClass.defaultValue:
{
    title: 'Get In Touch',
    type: 'primary',
    width: '200',
    widthUnits: 'px',
    height: '50',
    heightUnits: 'px',
  }

propertiesClass.name: emailData
propertiesClass.defaultValue:
{
    title: 'Email',
    placeholder: 'Enter your email',
    width: '100',
    widthUnits: '%',
    height: '40',
    heightUnits: 'px',
    type: 'email',
  }

propertiesClass.name: messageData
propertiesClass.defaultValue:
{
    title: 'Message',
    placeholder: 'Enter your message...',
    width: '100',
    widthUnits: '%',
    height: '150',
    heightUnits: 'px',
  }

propertiesClass.name: nameData
propertiesClass.defaultValue:
{
    title: 'Name',
    placeholder: 'Enter your name',
    width: '100',
    widthUnits: '%',
    height: '40',
    heightUnits: 'px',
    type: 'text',
  }

components.name: HeroSectionComponent

propertiesClass.name: buttonData
propertiesClass.defaultValue:
{
    title: 'Contact Me',
    type: 'primary',
    width: '200',
    widthUnits: 'px',
    height: '50',
    heightUnits: 'px',
  }

propertiesClass.name: heroBio
propertiesClass.defaultValue:
signal<string>(`As a passionate frontend developer with 4+ years of experience, I thrive on
    crafting responsive, user-friendly web experiences that blend performance
    with aesthetics. With expertise in Angular,React, HTML, CSS, and LESS, and a
    solid grasp of React fundamentals, I enjoy transforming complex requirements
    into seamless digital interfaces. I’m driven by the challenge of delivering
    high-impact features in dynamic startup environments and take pride in
    building products that truly resonate with users.`)

components.name: InputFieldComponent
LinksComponent
components.templateData:
<button
  type="button"
  (click)="onLinkClicked($event)"
  class="storybook-linkButton"
  title="{{ title() }}"
  [ngStyle]="{
    color: isActive() ? 'var(--color-nav-link)' : '',
    fontSize: fontSize()
  }"
  [attr.aria-label]="title()"
>
  {{ title() }}
</button>

components.name: NavBarComponent

propertiesClass.name: navItems
propertiesClass.defaultValue:
signal<{ title: string; hyperLink: string; isActive: boolean }[]>([
    { title: 'Home', hyperLink: '/home', isActive: true },
    { title: 'About', hyperLink: '/about', isActive: false },
    { title: 'Contact', hyperLink: '/contact', isActive: false },
  ])
